farms.title: Niagara
farms.medal: We plant a tree for every 30kg bag of Hunbatz sold!
farms.intro: A collection of small coffee producers in the western region known as 'the highlands' of Guatemala. With each 30kg bag of Hunbatz, we sell we plant a tree.
farms.description: A collection of small coffee producers in the western region known as 'the highlands' of Guatemala. With each 30kg bag of Hunbatz, we sell we plant a tree.

details.Characteristics ​Shade trees:: Endmeic trees, banana trees, bean trees
